name: remelt
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to melt (= become liquid) or make something melt again: I remelted the mixture and stirred it until it was smooth. After fifteen minutes, the jelly had remelted.
More examplesFewer examplesPlace the pan over a low heat to remelt the caramel.The mixture can be melted, cooled down, and remelted without losing any flavour.The glass bottles can be remelted and recycled.It is usually not a good idea to remelt cheese after you have already melted it and let it cool down.
